story_zako_battle_20_02/3701_0101_0100_1:
Look, look!
Is that [Name:PlayerNickname ] over there?!
story_zako_battle_20_02/3701_0101_0200_1: WOW! It really, really is [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ]!
story_zako_battle_20_02/3701_0101_0300_1:
You’ve been getting super famous lately,
haven’t you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Can I shake your hand?
story_zako_battle_20_02/3701_0101_0400_1:
Oh my gosh, it’s [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I heard you’re gonna be the next champion!
Can we battle? Pleeease!
story_zako_battle_20_02/3701_0501_0100_1:
Whoa, the rumors about you were right!
You’re amazing, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You’re totally gonna be the champion!
story_zako_battle_20_02/3701_0501_0200_1: Good luck at the finals! We’ll be rooting for you!
story_zako_battle_20_02/3801_0101_0100_1: Wahhh! I h-hate this, I hate this! It’s all your fault!
story_zako_battle_20_02/3801_0101_0200_1:
Sorry, Little Bro...
Sorry that your big brother is such a big loser.
story_zako_battle_20_02/3801_0101_0300_1:
B-but I wanted to battle in the f-finals!
Now I c-can’t! Wahhhh!
story_zako_battle_20_02/3801_0101_0400_1:
I know... I brought you all the way to Pasio
so we could do something cool, and I totally
screwed it up for us.
story_zako_battle_20_02/3801_0101_0500_1:
If only we could have one final battle with a
really awesome, famous Trainer before we
leave the island...
story_zako_battle_20_02/3801_0101_0600_1: but there’s no way that would ever happ—
story_zako_battle_20_02/3801_0101_0700_1:
AH! Oh my—!
Are you [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
THE [Name:PlayerNickname ]?!
story_zako_battle_20_02/3801_0101_0800_1:
Oh man, this has gotta be fate! Please, will you
battle us? It would give us an awesome memory
to take home!
story_zako_battle_20_02/3801_0501_0200_1:
We lost, but that’s OK! I had lotsa fun!
Pokémon battling is the bestest thing ever!
story_zako_battle_20_02/3801_0501_0300_1:
When we get home, let’s brag to Mom
and Dad about how we got to battle
against [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
